::Skyburst::

"Ok, I'm openly sending my signal now." He sent out an Autobot signal
for tracking as he said that.
"I hope to see you soon." He cleared the tube he came in.
"Flight mode." He transformed to his helicoptor mode, and headed for the
Autobot base.
